com.palantir.giraffe.command

Class CommandException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.palantir.giraffe.command.CommandException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CommandException
extends RuntimeException
    Runtime exception thrown when a command fails, usually by exiting with a non-zero exit status.

    The message contains detailed information about the command that ran, the execution system that ran it, and the output of the command. This information is also available programmatically via getter methods.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage()
        Returns a description of the executed command and how it failed.

        The description spans multiple lines and includes the:

        • Exit status
        • Executable name or path
        • Argument list, with each argument surrounded by double quotes
        • Working directory, if not the default
        • Environment, if not the default
        • Execution system URI
        • Contents of the output and error streams
        Overrides:
        getMessage in class Throwable
        Returns:
        a description of the failed command
